code: @Override protected RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(RestRequest restRequest, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     String[] indexes = Strings.splitStringByCommaToArray(restRequest.param("index")).     RemoveIndexLifecyclePolicyAction.Request changePolicyRequest = new RemoveIndexLifecyclePolicyAction.Request(indexes).     changePolicyRequest.masterNodeTimeout(restRequest.paramAsTime("master_timeout", changePolicyRequest.masterNodeTimeout())).     changePolicyRequest.indicesOptions(IndicesOptions.fromRequest(restRequest, changePolicyRequest.indicesOptions())).     return channel -> client.execute(RemoveIndexLifecyclePolicyAction.INSTANCE, changePolicyRequest, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
